item.title: 特朗普再次将 TikTok 出售期限延长 90 天
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第三次延长了中国公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）剥离 TikTok 美国业务的最后期限，允许该社交媒体应用在谈判进行期间继续在美国运行。【原文：President Donald Trump is extending for a third time the deadline for Chinese company ByteDance Ltd. to divest the American operations of TikTok, allowing the social media app to keep running in the US while negotiations proceed.】

item.title: 激进投资者向日本公司提出创纪录的建议
item.description: 激进投资者正在向日本公司提出数量空前的提案，这将使公司高管在年度股东大会上提心吊胆。【原文：Activist investors are inundating Japanese companies with an unprecedented number of proposals that will keep executives on their toes at annual general meetings.】

item.title: 米莱将阿根廷批发通胀降至 2020 年以来最低点
item.description: 周二，阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在经济方面再次取得胜利，因为数据显示 5 月份的批发价格出现了自大流行病最严重时期以来的首次下降，这为他在 10 月中期选举前的执政增添了动力。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei notched another economic victory Tuesday after data showed wholesale prices declined in May for the first time since the height of the pandemic, adding to his momentum before October midterm elections.】

item.title: 交易员纷纷押注下任美联储主席将下调美国利率
item.description: 美国利率交易员已经积累了创纪录的期货赌注，认为美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的任期将于 2026 年 5 月结束后，美联储将立即采取更加鸽派的倾向。【原文：US rates traders have amassed a record futures bet that the Federal Reserve will take on a more dovish tilt right after Chair Jerome Powell’s term ends in May 2026.】

item.title: Keyera 将以 38 亿美元收购 Plains 的加拿大 NGL 业务
item.description: Keyera Corp. 同意以 51.5 亿加元（37.7 亿美元）现金收购 Plains All American Pipeline LP 的加拿大天然气液化业务和部分美国资产。【原文：Keyera Corp. agreed to buy Plains All American Pipeline LP’s Canadian natural gas liquids business and some US assets for C$5.15 billion ($3.77 billion) in cash.】

item.title: 肯尼迪机场空中列车今夏票价下调 50%，吸引乘客放弃公路出行
item.description: 随着纽约市最繁忙机场的施工高峰期到来，穿梭于肯尼迪国际机场的旅客捷运公司将在今年夏天把票价降低 50%，以减少道路交通。【原文：The people mover that shuttles passengers to John F. Kennedy International Airport is cutting its fares by 50% this summer in a bid to reduce road traffic as construction peaks at the busiest New York City airport.】

item.title: 数字资产的避风港吸引力减弱，阿尔特币重拾跌势
item.description: 由于对中东冲突升级的担忧使投资者远离风险较高的资产，以太币和索拉纳币领跌加密货币。【原文：Ether and Solana led declines in cryptocurrencies as concern about escalating conflict in the Middle East has investors moving away from risker assets.】

item.title: 伊斯特利高收益债券型基金销售大跌近 50
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，Easterly 基金公司的高收益市政债券基金自上周五以来下跌了近 50%，原因是该投资组合从市政债券市场风险最高的部分卸载了流动性差的证券。【原文：Easterly Funds’ high-yield municipal-bond fund has dropped almost 50% since Friday as the portfolio unloaded illiquid securities from the riskiest part of the muni market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台湾将华为列入黑名单后，中美科技之争进一步扩大
item.description: 台湾加入了美国长达数年之久的遏制中国技术崛起的运动，将中国的人工智能和芯片制造冠军列入黑名单，这是史无前例的一步，可能预示着美国再次努力孤立其强大邻国的半导体行业。【原文：Taiwan joined a yearslong US campaign to curtail China’s technological ascent when it blacklisted the country’s AI and chipmaking champions, an unprecedented step that may signal a resurgent effort to isolate its powerful neighbor’s semiconductor sector.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势下服装零售商 Dynamite 将价格提高 9
item.description: 女装快速时尚零售商 Groupe Dynamite Inc. 首席执行官表示，该公司在过去一年中将价格提高了 9%，并计划在可预见的未来以两倍于通胀率的速度提高价格。周二，该公司公布了强劲的第一季度业绩，包括收入增加，股价创下自去年上市以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Women’s fast-fashion retailer Groupe Dynamite Inc. raised prices by 9% over the past year and plans to increase them at twice the rate of inflation for the foreseeable future, its chief executive officer said. Shares on Tuesday rose by the most since the company went public last year after it reported strong first-quarter results, including higher revenue.】

item.title: 摩根大通将在与 Coinbase 链接的区块链上试行存款代币 JPMD
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. will launch a pilot for a token called JPMD that represents dollar deposits at the world’s biggest bank, as financial institutions deepen their push into the digital-asset sector.】

item.title: 明日美联储决议的两大问题
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 一家锂电初创企业正在美国建设电池工厂，以规避特朗普的关税政策
item.description: 美国初创企业纯锂公司（Pure Lithium Corp.【原文：US startup Pure Lithium Corp. is working on a testing facility to build a new type of lithium battery that’s completely manufactured domestically.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 每月烧掉 10 亿美元，成本堆积如山
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 正试图通过债务和股权融资 93 亿美元，但根据与投资者共享的交易条款，甚至在资金进入银行之前，该公司就已计划在未来三个月内花掉一半以上的资金。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is trying to raise $9.3 billion in debt and equity, but even before the money is in the bank the company has plans to spend more than half of it in just the next three months, according to deal terms shared with investors.】

item.title: 亚马逊贾西称人工智能将减少公司员工数量
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.首席执行官安迪-贾西（Andy Jassy）表示，随着这家零售和云计算巨头利用人工智能处理更多任务，他预计公司的员工人数将在未来几年内减少。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. Chief Executive Officer Andy Jassy says he expects the company’s workforce to decline in the next few years as the retail and cloud-computing giant uses artificial intelligence to handle more tasks.】

item.title: 亲以色列黑客称对伊朗发动网络攻击
item.description: 一个亲以色列的黑客组织周二声称对伊朗一家主要银行遭受的破坏性网络攻击负责，这是两国之间持续军事冲突的最新进展。【原文：A pro-Israel hacking group claimed responsibility on Tuesday for a disruptive cyberattack against a major Iranian bank, the latest development in the ongoing military conflict between the two countries.】

item.title: 英国首席执行官称 Revolut 即将推出人工智能金融助理
item.description: 据金融科技公司的一位高管透露，Revolut 即将推出人工智能金融助手。【原文：Revolut will be launching its AI financial assistant soon, according to one of the fintech’s top executives.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称，核心通胀坚挺时更难降息
item.description: 加拿大央行官员表示，如果核心通胀保持坚挺，将很难进一步下调政策利率，但他们承认，如果经济继续疲软，可能需要更多的宽松政策。【原文：Bank of Canada officials said it would be tough to cut the policy interest rate further if core inflation remains firm, but acknowledged more easing may be needed if the economy continues to weaken.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司与埃克森公司联手赢得巴西有争议的石油区块
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）、埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Petrobras, Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. won exploration rights in Brazil’s Equatorial Margin, betting that the nation’s environmental regulator will finally open the promising offshore oil region for drilling after years of delay.】

item.title: 马歇尔-韦斯（Marshall Wace）从 Circle 的火热 IPO 中获利 7 亿美元
item.description: 马歇尔-韦斯（Marshall Wace）对稳定币发行商Circle Internet Group Inc.的早期投资已成为其有史以来最赚钱的交易之一，从该加密货币公司出色的首次公开募股中获利约7亿美元。【原文：An early investment in stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group Inc. has turned into one of the most profitable trades ever for Marshall Wace, netting a roughly $700 million profit from crypto firm’s stellar initial public offering.】

item.title: 加拿大人不顾贸易摩擦抢购 2023 年以来最多美国债券
item.description: 激烈的贸易战并没有影响加拿大投资者对美国资产的兴趣，他们继续大举投资美国债券。【原文：A bitter trade war hasn’t dented Canadian investors’ appetite for American assets as they continue to pile into US bonds.】

item.title: 中东液化石油气制造商仍在向全球市场供应液化石油气
item.description: 液化石油气是一种用于石化和烹饪的燃料，它继续通过霍尔木兹海峡运往全球市场。【原文：Shipments of liquefied petroleum gas — a fuel used in petrochemicals and cooking — have continued to global markets via the Strait of Hormuz, the maritime chokepoint that’s closely watched at times of tension in the Middle East.】

item.title: 高盛、摩根大通认为德国引领欧洲交易复兴
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：German dealmaking activity is poised to see the strongest revival in Europe thanks to a new €500 billion ($576 billion) government fund for infrastructure and climate projects, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 最高法院被要求审理对特朗普全球关税的质疑
item.description: 两家家族企业要求美国最高法院考虑取消唐纳德-特朗普总统最全面的关税措施，首次将一场具有全球经济影响的高风险斗争摆在了大法官面前。【原文：Two family-owned businesses are asking the US Supreme Court to consider striking down President Donald Trump’s most sweeping tariffs, putting a high-stakes fight with worldwide economic implications before the justices for the first time.】

item.title: 印度航空公司打捞人员在坠机现场找到第二个黑匣子
item.description: 上周，印度航空公司一架喷气式客机坠毁，搜救人员在飞机残骸中找到了第二个黑匣子，他们希望获得更多证据，以了解事故原因，除一人外，机上242人全部遇难。【原文：Search crews sifting through the wreckage of the Air India jetliner that crashed last week retrieved the second black box, as they seek to gain more evidence to understand what caused the accident that killed all but one of the 242 people on board.】

item.title: 伊利首席执行官预计咖啡供应充足，咖啡价格将继续下滑
item.description: 意大利烘焙商 Illycaffe SpA 预计，咖啡豆的成本将继续下降，从而帮助客户避免在价格上涨后出现进一步的涨价。【原文：Italian roaster Illycaffe SpA expects the cost of coffee beans to continue to fall, helping to shield customers from further hikes following a run-up in prices.】

item.title: 申博姆称很快将有与特朗普会面的新机会
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）预计将很快与唐纳德-特朗普会面，因为美国总统提前离开了在加拿大举行的七国集团峰会，取消了原定的会面。【原文：Mexico’s President Claudia Sheinbaum expects to meet Donald Trump soon after their planned encounter was canceled when the US president departed early from a Group of Seven summit in Canada.】

item.title: 印度监管机构认定印航 787 飞机无重大安全问题
item.description: 上周，印度航空公司一架波音787喷气机坠毁，造成241名乘客和机组人员死亡，印度航空安全监管机构在对该公司机队进行检查时未发现重大安全问题。【原文：India’s aviation safety regulator found no major safety concerns with Air India’s fleet of Boeing Co. 787 jets during ongoing inspections following a crash last week that killed 241 passengers and crew.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织就债务重组战略会见新兴市场债权国
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，国际货币基金组织的一组官员上周在伦敦会见了私人债权人，这是该多边贷款机构出版新兴市场主权债务重组新报告工作的一部分。【原文：A group of International Monetary Fund officials met private creditors last week in London, as part of the multilateral lender’s work to publish a new report on sovereign debt restructurings in emerging markets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行在制定利率时应关注油价和欧元走势
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行在制定借贷成本时需要评估油价和欧元的波动。【原文：The European Central Bank needs to assess fluctuations in oil prices and the euro as it sets borrowing costs, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】
